name: Majong Classic 2 - Travel Around The World
name_original: Majong Classic 2 - Travel Around The World
description:
- Amazing TRAVEL mode for real adventurers
- Lots of SPECIAL level
- GOLDEN tiles on every level
- BONUS level on each location

This is a classic majong puzzle for one player with two special modes:

TRAVEL MODE
- travel through the world playing classic chinese solitaire
- collect golden tiles to unlock bonus level on each location
- deal with every layout as fast as possible to earn stars
- open all the locations and explore all the sights

ONLINE MODE
- real-time contest with other Majong lovers from all over the world
- embrace your competitive spirit and show the best score!
